UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of multifunctional cationic and amphipathic peptides from soybean proteins.
Literature.Author: Taniguchi M, Saito K, Nomoto T, Namae T, Ochiai A, Saitoh E, Tanaka T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(IC50=42µM),Porphyromonas gingivalis ATCC 33277(MIC=>1024µM),Cutibacterium acnes JCM 6473(IC50=>200µM),Cutibacterium acnes JCM 6473(MIC=>1024µM),Streptococcus mutans JCM 5705(IC50=>600µM),Streptococcus mutans JCM 5705(MIC=>1024µM),Candida albicans NBRC 1385(IC50=>125µM),Candida albicans NBRC 1385(MIC=>1024µM)
